title: Museum Diamond Escape
goal: Steal the diamond and escape the museum.

rooms.name: The Diamond Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit room at the heart of the museum. In the center stands a wooden pedestal topped with a glass lockbox containing a large, shining diamond. A massive metal door guards the only exit. Along the walls hang five framed paintings, each signed by a different artist.

items.name: wood pedestal
items.description: A polished wood pedestal supporting a locked glass box. An inscription is carved into the base.
items.text: For only those who understand in what order the artists of the world stand.

items.name: glass lockbox
items.description: A reinforced glass case protecting the diamond. A small keypad is embedded in its base.

items.name: large shiny diamond
items.description: A priceless, sparkling diamond—the target of your heist.

items.name: large metal door
items.description: A heavy security door that locks automatically at night. A digital keypad beside it awaits a 4-digit code.

items.name: painting signed Claude 1
items.description: A landscape of a farm with a man in the foreground. Signed 'Claude, 1'.

items.name: painting signed Gene 9
items.description: A still life of fruits. Signed 'Gene, 9'.

items.name: painting signed Julius 47
items.description: A beach landscape with a man in the mid-ground. Signed 'Julius, 47'.

items.name: painting signed Roberts 90
items.description: A portrait of two dancers. Signed 'Roberts, 90'.

items.name: painting signed Garfield 5
items.description: A mountain landscape with a man in the background. Signed 'Garfield, 5'.

rooms.name: Museum Main Hall
rooms.description: The ornate entrance hall of the museum, filled with frescoes on the high ceiling. A check-in desk sits near the large front doors. A decorative table in the center of the room holds a tall flower centerpiece.

items.name: table with flower centerpiece
items.description: A decorative table with an extravagant flower arrangement. Something is concealed within the petals.

items.name: hidden black light
items.description: A small black light hidden in the flower centerpiece.

items.name: check-in desk
items.description: A wooden desk with three drawers. A blank calendar lies on its surface.

items.name: blank calendar
items.description: A calendar that appears empty in normal light. Under black light, hidden writing emerges.
items.text: January 1st - January 7th : 1st , January 7th - January 14th : 2nd, January 14 - January 21st 3rd

items.name: museum exit doors
items.description: Heavy double doors at the north side of the hall. A keyhole sits beneath the handle.

items.name: large wall clock
items.description: A massive clock showing the date and time.

items.name: small key
items.description: A small brass key. Its purpose is unclear.

items.name: baby key
items.description: A spare key with no immediate use.

items.name: main door key
items.description: The key that unlocks the museum exit doors.

rooms.name: Getaway Car
rooms.description: The back of a speeding van filled with your masked accomplices. Police sirens fade into the distance as the vehicle races away from the museum.
rooms.win_message: You made it out of the museum with the diamond and without being caught by the police! You win! Try your best to stay out of trouble!
